original_text: For in the eighth year of his reign, while he was yet a boy, he began to seek the God of David his father, and in the twelfth year he began to purge Judah and Jerusalem of the high places, the Asherim, and the carved and the metal images.
korean_text: 아직도 어렸을 때 곧 왕위에 있은 지 팔 년에 그의 조상 다윗의 하나님을 비로소 찾고 제십이년에 유다와 예루살렘을 비로소 정결하게 하여 그 산당들과 아세라 목상들과 아로새긴 우상들과 부어 만든 우상들을 제거하여 버리매

sentences.original_text: For in the eighth year of his reign,
while he was yet a boy,
he began to seek the God of David his father,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 아버지 다윗의 하나님을 찾기 시작했고,

sentences.original_text: he began to purge Judah and Jerusalem
and the carved and the metal images.
